summary: This is an email chain forwarding a legal filing in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). The email is from Bobbi C. Sternheim, an attorney, to prosecutors, with copies to other defense attorneys, attaching a courtesy copy of a filing related to 'VICs' (likely Victims). It discusses scheduling a call to discuss the matter.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney sending a courtesy copy of a legal filing in the U.S. v. Maxwell case and requesting a call to discuss. She identifies herself as from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim.

events.title: Legal Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim files a document (attached as 'Letter re VICs 8-18-18.pdf') in the case U.S. v. Maxwell and sends a courtesy copy to prosecutors, requesting a call to discuss.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
It attaches a filing titled 'Letter re VICs 8-18-18.pdf', which likely concerns victims ('VICs') in the Maxwell case.
The email is addressed to prosecutors (redacted) and copied to defense attorneys Christian Everdel, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
Bobbi C. Sternheim provides her new office address in New York, NY 10007.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and coordination between defense attorneys in the Maxwell case as of August 2021.
